RG 7.1. Office of the Senior VP University Development and Alumni Giving
New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera
New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera

NYU Alumni Magazine is a general interest publication covering the university's array of alumni, faculty, and student newsmakers in politics, arts & letters, academia, entertainment, sports, and more. It is produced by a team of freelance writers, editors, and designers, and distributed to nearly 250,000 alumni, faculty, and parents across the country. The magazine is available online back to Fall 2007.
